resources.string: Use the app according to the instructions given on each individual page. Use the X in the top left to return to the home screen.
The easy way to identify medicinal alternatives!
Please select which mode you want to use to identify your medication
Please enter the 2 numbers of the ndc code as indicated on the packaging separated by the hyphen
Please select the initial country the medication is coming from and the country you want to search for alternatives in.
